name: Puppet Fighter
description:
Puppet Fighter

Puppet fighter is a free arcade with a lot of game modes, an amusing physics ragdoll, the ability to play with friends on one phone and user-friendly controls. 
In the modern world, an intertemporal portal has opened, through which people from different eras can freely move. Of course, all this can not end well. Choose for whom you will fight... though, it does not matter for whom, just enjoy the game and have fun!

✪ A LOT OF DIFFERENT EXCITING GAME MODES ✪ 

✪ FUNNY PHYSICS OF PUPPET FIGHTERS ✪ 

✪ PLAY WITH OTHER FIGHTERS ONLINE ✪ 

✪ THE GENERATOR OF THE INCREDIBLE MOMENTS ✪ 

✪ COLORFUL AND LIVING 3D GRAPHICS ✪ 

✪ SHOP WITH INTERESTING GAMEPLAY GOODS ✪ 

The game continues to develop actively. If you want to suggest some ideas or report bugs, please write about it in the comments, I will listen to your wishes.
